claim: Catching Fire is a sequel to The Hunger Games.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Hunger Games : Catching Fire is a 2013 American dystopian science fiction adventure film based on Suzanne Collins ' dystopian novel , Catching Fire  (  2009  )  , the second installment in The Hunger Games trilogy .

claim: Catching Fire is a sequel to The Hunger Games.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The four films , entitled The Hunger Games , The Hunger Games : Catching Fire , The Hunger Games : Mockingjay -- Part 1 and The Hunger Games : Mockingjay -- Part 2 , were released serially worldwide between March 2012 and 2015 .

claim: Catching Fire is a sequel to The Hunger Games.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film is the sequel to The Hunger Games  (  2012  )  and the second installment in The Hunger Games film series , produced by Nina Jacobson and Jon Kilik , and distributed by Lionsgate .

claim: Catching Fire is a sequel to The Hunger Games.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Hunger Games : Catching Fire was released on November 15 , 2013 , in Brazil ; November 20 in Finland , Sweden , and Norway ; November 21 in the United Kingdom ; and November 22 in IMAX , in the United States .

claim: Catching Fire is a sequel to The Hunger Games.
